haskell.completionSnippetsOn.description: Show snippets with type information when using code completion
haskell.completionSnippetsOn.title: Completion Snippets

haskell.diagnosticsOnChange.description: Compute diagnostics continuously as you type. Turn off to only generate diagnostics on file save.

haskell.formatOnImportOn.description: When adding an import, use the formatter on the result

haskell.formattingProvider.description: The formatter to use when formatting a document or range. Ensure the plugin is enabled.

haskell.logFile.description: If set, redirects the logs to a file.

haskell.plugin.ghcide-type-lenses.config.description: Control how type lenses are shown
enumDescriptions: Always displays type lenses of global bindings
Only display type lenses of exported global bindings
Follows error messages produced by GHC about missing signatures

haskell.plugin.splice.globalOn.description: Enables splice plugin (expand template haskell definitions)

haskell.plugin.tactic.config.features.markdownDescription: Features set used by wingman (tactic) plugin

haskell.plugin.tactic.config.max_use_cto.markdownDescription: Maximum number of `Use constructor <x>` code actions that can appear
haskell.plugin.tactic.config.max_use_cto.title: Max number of constructors

haskell.releasesURL.description: An optional URL to override where to check for haskell-language-server releases

haskell.serverExecutablePath.description: Manually set a language server executable. Can be something on the $PATH or a path to an executable itself. Works with ~, ${HOME} and ${workspaceFolder}.

haskell.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

enumDescriptions: Always download the latest available version when it is published
Prompt before upgrading to a newer version
haskell.updateBehavior.markdownDescription: Determine what to do when a new version of the language server is available.
